parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Object Detection

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array with all the units in the group or group of the unit.<br>
For a destroyed object an empty array is returned.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Since 2.01.146926, type can also be [[Side]]. Command will then return all units of given side.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[units]] type

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> type: [[Group]] or [[Object]], <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.01.146926</value></part></template> also [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Object]]s

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_myUnitCount = [[count]] [[units]] [[group]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value> <code>_isInMyGroup = _soldier1 [[in]] [[units]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[group]], [[allGroups]], [[allUnits]], [[playableUnits]], [[switchableUnits]], [[vehicles]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on September 24, 2009</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Kronzky|Kronzky]]</dt>
<dd class="note">The returned array on MP clients is not updated when team members die (only when they are deleted). (''Tested on VBS2'')
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on July 3, 2020 - 03:36 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Ilias38rus|Ilias38rus]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Seem to always return a list with the same order as the squad menu of the leader.
</dd>
</dl>
